verbs.description: The Trump administration ’s enforcement of [V: existing] [ARG1: U.S. immigration law] has driven the left into a frenzy . Accusations against the president and immigration law supporters run the gamut from labeling them as horrible child abusers and family destroyers , to calling them Hitler and the gestapo , throwing innocents into third reich - era internment camps .
